snippet: The announcement followed a statement by the program’s creator, Simon Cowell, who said that he would resume his hosting duties this year on the original British incarnation.
abstract: Fox cancels singing competition series The X Factor after host Simon Cowell decides to return to British version of show.
lead_paragraph: The announcement followed a statement by the program’s creator, Simon Cowell, who said that he would resume his hosting duties this year on the original British incarnation.

headline.print_headline: Fox Cancels ‘The X Factor’ After Three Seasons
headline.main: Fox Cancels ‘The X Factor’ After Three Seasons
